We added more free business and financial stories to our news pages and fixed a bug on the Markets screen that prevented all Stock Market Today articles from appearing.
We restyled the navigation bar on the News screen, making it easier to find our ETF, Technology and Economy articles.
Bug fixes and optimizations

We added more free business and financial stories to our news pages and fixed a bug on the Markets screen that prevented all Stock Market Today articles from appearing.
We restyled the navigation bar on the News screen, making it easier to find our ETF, Technology and Economy articles.
Bug fixes and optimizations

-New video category: Featured Videos
-Stock Market Today videos are back!
-Various bug fixes and optimizations

Now, IBD Digital members have access to their favorite premium features, IBD premium lists, charts and personal stock lists.

Now, IBD Digital members have access to their favorite premium features, IBD premium lists, charts and personal stock lists.

-- New in 2.0.1: A few members reported login issues. Fixed.

Now, IBD Digital members have access to their favorite premium features, IBD premium lists, charts and personal stock lists.

-- New in 2.0.1: A few members reported login issues. Fixed.

• Fixed a bug that signed out users from the app after signing into Investors.com or MarketSmith.com.
• Fixed a problem with articles loading on iPad.
• Fixed a layout issue with videos in landscape orientation on iPhone X.
• Added a legend for moving average lines to charts on Quote pages.
• Other bug fixes and optimizations.

• Fixed a bug that signed out users from the app after signing into Investors.com or MarketSmith.com.
• Fixed a problem with articles loading on iPad.
• Fixed a layout issue with videos in landscape orientation on iPhone X.
• Added a legend for moving average lines to charts on Quote pages.
• Other bug fixes and optimizations.
Various bug fixes and optimizations.
Various bug fixes and optimizations.
Thanks for using the IBD app! In this update we fixed a few bugs to improve your experience and prevent app crashes. There is also update to our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.
Thanks for using the IBD app! In this update we fixed a few bugs to improve your experience and prevent app crashes. There is also update to our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.

This IBD update gives you more ways than ever to stay on top of leading stocks. You’ll find:

• Callouts of recent chart action for stocks on IBD’s proprietary stock lists.
• A widget accessible on your device's home screen that lets you create a personal stock list to see mini-charts, current price/volume and ratings.
• Stocks are flagged when they appear on any premium list such as IBD 50, IPO Leaders, etc.
• Ability to use Face ID or Touch ID.
• Videos embedded in article pages.

Also included: bug fixes and optimizations to improve app speed and functionality.

Update 2.2 gives you more ways than ever to stay on top of leading stocks. You’ll find:

• Callouts of recent chart action for stocks on IBD’s proprietary stock lists.
• A widget accessible on your device's home screen that lets you create a personal stock list to see mini-charts, current price/volume and ratings.
• Stocks are flagged when they appear on any premium list such as IBD 50, IPO Leaders, etc.

• Videos embedded in article pages.

• An interactive Market Pulse module in the Big Picture article. Tap Market Pulse to expand and see tickers with links to quote pages.
• New dynamic stock charts in article pages to track price and volume.
• Bug fixes and performance optimizations

Thanks for using the IBD app! In this update we cleaned up some code to speed things up and squashed a few pesky bugs.
Thanks for using the IBD app! In this update we cleaned up some code to speed things up and squashed a few pesky bugs.

Thanks for using the IBD app! In this release we’ve added pre-market and after-hours pricing on all stock quotes. We’ve also added extended-hours pricing for QQQ, SPY and DIA to the top of the app home screen. And to give you a faster, smoother experience, we did a deep clean behind the curtain. We’re always happy to hear from you. Reach out with questions or suggestions at investors.com/contactus

We've squashed a few pesky bugs.
We've squashed a few pesky bugs.
We made it easier to find IBD's financial news and analysis videos. Just go to the News page and tap Videos.
We made it easier to find IBD's financial news and analysis videos. Just go to the News page and tap Videos.

• Looking to improve your stock picks? Check out our new IBD Stock Of The Day overview for quick highlights of leading stocks and tips on when to buy.
• Browse the IBD 50 and other lists with our new list navigation bar… or just swipe left/right when viewing a stock on a list.
• Access search from anywhere in the app and jump to stocks you've recently viewed.

• Access search from anywhere in the app and jump to stocks you've recently viewed.

6.0.1
• We fixed a bug that caused the app to crash when tapping a ticker symbol on the Quote page's Rank Within Group panel.

• 7.0.1: We fixed a bug that caused the app to crash when watching a video in some versions of iOS.
• Stay up to date as you read. We added real-time price change data to the “In This Article” toolbar.
• Swipe left on an article to open the next one, right to go back.
• Articles you’ve opened from anywhere in app — from Lists, Quotes, and more — are grayed out on News pages.
• Tap on images embedded in articles to zoom in.
